languages.text: "Во-первых, это иронично. Ну а во-вторых... Это удобная маскировка. Никто не смотрит в лицо комиссару, все смотрят на фуражку, шинель и кушак. И придурки вроде моих бывших товарищей считали, что комиссар не может им врать... Идиоты. Он всегда врет".

"Well, first off, because it's ironic. And besides... it's a handy disguise. No one ever looks at the Commissar's face — they look at his cap, his coat, his belt. Plus, simpletons like my former fellow Guardsmen think a Commissar can't lie... Idiots. The Commissar always lies."
languages.original_text: "Во-первых, это иронично. Ну а во-вторых... Это удобная маскировка. Никто не смотрит в лицо комиссару, все смотрят на фуражку, шинель и кушак. И придурки вроде моих бывших товарищей считали, что комиссар не может им врать... Идиоты. Он всегда врет".

traits.locale_text: "Well, first off, because it's ironic. And besides... it's a handy disguise. No one ever looks at the Commissar's face, they look at his cap, his coat, his belt. Plus, simpletons like my former fellow Guardmen think a Commissar can't lie... Idiots. The Commissar always lies."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “嗯，首先，因为这么做很讽刺。其次……这个身份用起来很方便。根本不会有人看政委的脸，他们只会看他的帽子、他的外套、他的腰带。而且，我以前那些愚蠢的同僚认为政委绝对不会说谎……真是一群白痴，政委从来都是满口谎言。”
languages.original_text: "Well, first off, because it's ironic. And besides... it's a handy disguise. No one ever looks at the Commissar's face — they look at his cap, his coat, his belt. Plus, simpletons like my former fellow Guardsmen think a Commissar can't lie... Idiots. The Commissar always lies."

traits.locale_text: “嗯，首先，因为这么做很讽刺。其次……这个身份用起来很方便。根本不会有人看政委的脸，他们只会看他的帽子、他的外套、他的腰带。而且，我以前那些愚蠢的同僚认为政委绝对不会说谎……真是一群白痴，政委从来都是满口谎言。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「皮肉めいていて面白いからです。それに…手軽に変装できる。コミッサーの顔をじっくり見る奴は誰もいません――皆、彼の帽子やコートやベルトを見ているのです。私の元仲間の衛兵のような単純な愚図は、コミッサーが嘘をつけないと思っていますしね…なんて愚かなんでしょう。コミッサーとは常に嘘をつくものなのに」
languages.original_text: "Well, first off, because it's ironic. And besides... it's a handy disguise. No one ever looks at the Commissar's face — they look at his cap, his coat, his belt. Plus, simpletons like my former fellow Guardsmen think a Commissar can't lie... Idiots. The Commissar always lies."

traits.locale_text: 「皮肉めいていて面白いからです。それに…手軽に変装できる。コミッサーの顔をじっくり見る奴は誰もいません――皆、彼の帽子やコートやベルトを見ているのです。私の元仲間の衛兵のような単純な愚図は、コミッサーが嘘をつけないと思っていますしね…なんて愚かなんでしょう。コミッサーとは常に嘘をつくものなのに」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Bueno, para empezar, es irónico. Pero además... es un buen disfraz. Nadie mira a un Comisario a la cara: todos se fijan en su sombrero, su abrigo y su cinturón. Además, los imbéciles como mis antiguos compañeros de la Guardia creen que los Comisarios no pueden mentir... Menuda estupidez. Los Comisarios siempre mienten».
languages.original_text: "Well, first off, because it's ironic. And besides... it's a handy disguise. No one ever looks at the Commissar's face — they look at his cap, his coat, his belt. Plus, simpletons like my former fellow Guardsmen think a Commissar can't lie... Idiots. The Commissar always lies."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, para empezar, es irónico. Pero además... es un buen disfraz. Nadie mira a un Comisario a la cara: todos se fijan en su sombrero, su abrigo y su cinturón. Además, los imbéciles como mis antiguos compañeros de la Guardia creen que los Comisarios no pueden mentir... Menuda estupidez. Los Comisarios siempre mienten».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "Well, first off, because it's ironic. And besides... it's a handy disguise. No one ever looks at the Commissar's face — they look at his cap, his coat, his belt. Plus, simpletons like my former fellow Guardsmen think a Commissar can't lie... Idiots. The Commissar always lies."

languages.text: « Eh bien, parce que c'est sacrément ironique, déjà. Et puis... c'est plutôt pratique, comme déguisement. Personne ne regarde un commissaire dans les yeux. Non, on regarde sa casquette, son manteau, sa ceinture. Sans compter que les simples d'esprit, comme mes anciens camarades, pensent qu'un commissaire ne peut pas mentir... Les imbéciles. Un commissaire ment tout le temps. »
languages.original_text: "Well, first off, because it's ironic. And besides... it's a handy disguise. No one ever looks at the Commissar's face — they look at his cap, his coat, his belt. Plus, simpletons like my former fellow Guardsmen think a Commissar can't lie... Idiots. The Commissar always lies."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, parce que c'est sacrément ironique, déjà. Et puis... c'est plutôt pratique, comme déguisement. Personne ne regarde un commissaire dans les yeux. Non, on regarde sa casquette, son manteau, sa ceinture. Sans compter que les simples d'esprit, comme mes anciens camarades, pensent qu'un commissaire ne peut pas mentir... Les imbéciles. Un commissaire ment tout le temps. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Nun, zunächst, weil es ironisch ist. Und außerdem ... ist es eine praktische Verkleidung. Niemand sieht einem Kommissar ins Gesicht – immer nur auf die Mütze, den Mantel, den Gürtel. Außerdem denken Dummköpfe wie meine früheren Wachkameraden, ein Kommissar könne nicht lügen ... Idioten. Der Kommissar lügt ständig."
languages.original_text: "Well, first off, because it's ironic. And besides... it's a handy disguise. No one ever looks at the Commissar's face — they look at his cap, his coat, his belt. Plus, simpletons like my former fellow Guardsmen think a Commissar can't lie... Idiots. The Commissar always lies."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, zunächst, weil es ironisch ist. Und außerdem ... ist es eine praktische Verkleidung. Niemand sieht einem Kommissar ins Gesicht – immer nur auf die Mütze, den Mantel, den Gürtel. Außerdem denken Dummköpfe wie meine früheren Wachkameraden, ein Kommissar könne nicht lügen ... Idioten. Der Kommissar lügt ständig."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Bir kere ironik. Ayrıca kullanışlı bir kılık. Kimse bir Komiser'in yüzüne bakmaz; şapkasına, paltosuna ve kemerine bakarlar. Ayrıca eski Muhafız dostlarım gibi avanaklar, bir Komiser'in yalan söyleyemeyeceğini düşünür. Aptallar. Komiser her zaman yalan söyler."
languages.original_text: "Well, first off, because it's ironic. And besides... it's a handy disguise. No one ever looks at the Commissar's face — they look at his cap, his coat, his belt. Plus, simpletons like my former fellow Guardsmen think a Commissar can't lie... Idiots. The Commissar always lies."

traits.locale_text: "Yani ironik bir kere. Ayrıca kullanışlı da bir kılık. Kimse bir Komiser'in yüzüne bakmaz; şapkasına, paltosuna ve kemerine bakarlar. Ayrıca eski Muhafız dostlarım gibi basit beyinliler, bir Komiser'in yalan söyleyemeyeceğini düşünür. Aptallar. Komiser her zaman yalan söyler."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
